DIY dental tools: You can make your own dental tools using materials such as cotton, toothpicks, and string.
Brush regularly: Brush your teeth at least twice a day, or even more often if possible, to remove plaque and prevent tooth decay.
Floss daily: Flossing is essential for removing food particles and preventing gum disease.
Use a tongue scraper: A tongue scraper can help remove bacteria and freshen your breath.
Drink plenty of water: Drinking plenty of water can help wash away food particles and bacteria from your teeth.
